This distribution includes the following third-party software:

1. PyMuPDF (fitz)
   - License: GNU AGPLv3
   - Source: https://github.com/pymupdf/PyMuPDF

2. OpenCV (opencv-python)
   - License: Apache License 2.0
   - Source: https://github.com/opencv/opencv

3. Playwright
   - License: Apache License 2.0
   - Source: https://github.com/microsoft/playwright

4. llama.cpp (via llama_cpp_python)
   - License: MIT
   - Source: https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp

5. MinerU
   - License: Apache License 2.0
   - Source: https://github.com/opendatalab/MinerU

6. qpdf
   - License: Apache License 2.0
   - Source: https://github.com/qpdf/qpdf

7. Ghostscript
   - License: GNU AGPLv3
   - Source: https://www.ghostscript.com/
